title: Manage Refinery Hydrogen Supply
description: A refinery operator manages the hydrogen plant and distribution network to ensure a reliable supply for hydrotreating and hydrocracking units.

tasks.description: Check the current production rate and purity of the steam methane reformer (SMR) hydrogen plant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator confirms the plant is running stably and producing on-spec hydrogen.

tasks.description: Review the hydrogen consumption of the main user units and the pressure in the hydrogen supply header.
tasks.expected_outcome: The review shows that demand is increasing and header pressure is starting to drop.

tasks.description: Increase the production rate of the SMR to meet the higher demand and stabilize the header pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The SMR's production is ramped up, and the hydrogen network pressure returns to normal.
